name: portfolio
description: Hi. I'm a starter theme called  portfolio, A modern and clean WordPress theme, designed to showcase projects, skills, and achievements with style and simplicity. Perfect for portfolios and professional websites.
author: Amit Bahuguna

scripts.bundle: dir-archiver --src . --dest ../_s.zip --exclude .DSPORTFOLIOtore .stylelintrc.json .eslintrc .git .gitattributes .github .gitignore README.md composer.json composer.lock node_modules vendor package-lock.json package.json .travis.yml phpcs.xml.dist sass style.css.map yarn.lock
